section.title: Legal tasks
section.p: This section contains an overview of the legal tasks and documents required by the project, first and foremost the text licensing contract to build a usable corpus.
We have decided to use the contracts from Helsinki University, and both the originals as well as our internal translations are available below, together with an example from the University of Oslo.

ul.li:
The example from the University of Oslo, Department of Linguistics and Scandinavian Studies, with the corresponding end user license:
The text licensing contract (corresponds to contract 1 and 2 in the Helsinki model)
The end user contract, corresponding to contract 3 below

The Helsinki University license contract from the Linguistic Department consists of four parts:
First part: LaTeX, pdf and our translation
Second part orig. LaTeX, pdf and our translation
Third part orig. LaTeX, pdf and our translation
The fourth part is not available yet
There is also a supporting style specification for the LaTeX originals

Our own translations of the Helsinki license contracts:
First part
Second part
Third part
Fourth part not yet available
These translations will be sent to a lawyer for thorough checking.
